overview:
Markus Kaarto is the Vice President Sales & Marketing of Axel Technologies, based in Helsinki, Finland. Markus has worked in the IT and embedded software industry for more than 14 years and has an established track record having conducted business with almost every major Mobile OEM in the world.

Markus has held multiple managerial positions during his career; including leading European sales operations of mobile multimedia companies such as Intervideo & Emuzed. Prior to joining Axel, he ran a strategic business development consultancy specializing in Asian device manufacturers. Markus holds an MBA degree for International Marketing.
